name: Chickpea Blondies
description: Chickpea blondies with loads of chocolate chips are made with beans but you'd never know it! They're vegan, gluten-free, flour-free and only 9 ingredients.
recipeIngredient: 15 ounces canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed (1 1/2 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 8 by 8 inch pan with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 8 by 8 inch pan with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, add all the ingredients except the chocolate chips and blend until very smooth, stopping to scrape the sides as needed.
recipeInstructions.name: In a food processor, add all the ingredients except the chocolate chips and blend until very smooth, stopping to scrape the sides as needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in half of the chocolate chips with a spoon. Transfer to the prepared pan and spread the batter evenly. I usually wet my hands and press down gently, or use a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in half of the chocolate chips with a spoon. Transfer to the prepared pan and spread the batter evenly. I usually wet my hands and press down gently, or use a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the last 1/4 cup chocolate chips on top of the batter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the last 1/4 cup chocolate chips on top of the batter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let them cool at least 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy! I like to store leftover bars in the refrigerator; they will last up to 1 week this way and they taste good cold. Or store in a covered container at room temperature for 2-3 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Let them cool at least 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy! I like to store leftover bars in the refrigerator; they will last up to 1 week this way and they taste good cold. Or store in a covered container at room temperature for 2-3 days.

keywords: chickpea blondies, chocolate chip blondies, healthy blondies, vegan blondies
